CustomField.description: If entered, the text in this field will be used to find matching text in this field among widgets. If a widget with the same key is found it will skip showing that widget allowing only one of this key type to appear on a page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If entered, the text in this field will be used to find matching text in this field among widgets. If a widget with the same key is found it will skip showing that widget allowing only one of this key type to appear on a page.
CustomField.label: Only One Widget Key
